# Docker TUI

A beautiful TUI for managing Docker containers.

![Docker Dashboard](https://img.shields.io/badge/docker-tui-blue)

## Installation

```bash
pip install docker-tui
```

## Usage

```bash
dt
# or
docker-tui
```

## Features

- View all containers (running/stopped)
- Real-time CPU and memory stats
- Container logs with live updates
- Start/Stop/Restart containers
- Delete containers
- Filter containers by name
- Keyboard shortcuts

## Keyboard Shortcuts

| Key | Action |
|-----|--------|
| `r` | Refresh containers |
| `s` | Start container |
| `x` | Stop container |
| `t` | Restart container |
| `d` | Delete container |
| `l` | Show logs |
| `/` | Filter containers |
| `q` | Quit |
| `?` | Help |

## Requirements

- Python 3.10+
- Docker running locally
